metadata.title: CVE-2021-45958 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: UltraJSON (aka ujson) through 5.1.0 has a stack-based buffer overflow inBuffer_AppendIndentUnchecked (called from encode). Exploitation can, forexample, use a large amount of indentation.

criterions.comment: ujson: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
pandas: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
